definition: cooked by dry heat in an oven, negative criticism, cook with dry heat, usually in an oven
details:
adjective
- cooked by dry heat in an oven
= example: cooked by dry heat in an oven
= synonyms: roasted
noun
- negative criticism
= synonyms: knock
- a piece of meat roasted or for roasting and of a size for slicing into more than one portion
= synonyms: joint
verb
- cook with dry heat, usually in an oven
= example: cook with dry heat, usually in an oven
- subject to laughter or ridicule
= synonyms: ridicule
